description: A stylesheet defining theme colors and styles for the App component, including light and dark themes.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styled to center content and manage background color based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application to display content in a flexible box layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling that incorporates theme colors with transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button class for toggling between light and dark themes with hover and active effects.
